snippet: The move followed Europe’s decision to impose preliminary tariffs of 11.8 percent on solar panels imported from China.
abstract: China says it has begun a trade investigation of wines imported from the European Union; move follows Europe’s decision to impose preliminary tariffs of 11.8 percent on solar panels imported from China.

byline.contributor: James Kanter contributed reporting from Brussels, Eric Pfanner from Serraval, France, and Hilda Wang from Hong Kong.

lead_paragraph: The move followed Europe’s decision to impose preliminary tariffs of 11.8 percent on solar panels imported from China.

headline.seo: China to Investigate European Wines After Solar Panel Tariffs
headline.main: China Aims at Europe’s Wines After Solar Panel Action
headline.print_headline: China Aims at Europe’s Wines After Solar Panel Action
